comment: Pre-review complete. Verified frontmatter: title='SOP-001 and SOP-002 alignment corrections', revision_summary='Initial draft'. All 12 required sections present per SOP-002 Section 6. Technical changes verified against current SOP-001 and SOP-002: (1) Section 4.1 note removal appropriate - SOPs define policy not implementation; (2) Section 13.6 fix command correction from '(QA/lead only)' to '(Administrator group only)' aligns with Section 4.2 permission matrix; (3) SOP-002 Section 3 group references improve cross-SOP clarity; (4-5) CAPA removal from Sections 6.2 and 6.12 is correct - CAPA is not a document type. No placeholder content (TBD/TODO/FIXME). Execution section placeholders appropriate for pre-execution phase. Traceability to CR-037 and SDLC-QMS-RS established. Recommend for pre-approval.

Post-review of CR-038 complete. Per SOP-002 Section 7.3: (1) All 5 EIs show Pass outcome - no failures; (2) No VARs required; (3) Modified documents verified EFFECTIVE: SOP-001 v19.0, SOP-002 v8.0; (4) Execution Summary documents completion evidence. Verification checks performed on effective documents: SOP-001 line 737 shows '(Administrator group only)'; SOP-002 CAPA count=1 (revision_summary only, body content clean); SOP-002 lines 36-37 contain 'Quality group' and 'Reviewer group' references. All CR-038 objectives achieved. Recommend for post-approval.
